container_group_name.title: Container Group Name
container_group_name.description: Must be 2-63 lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens. Cannot start with a number or start or end with a hyphen.

AWS_ENDPOINT_URL.title: AWS_ENDPOINT_URL
AWS_ENDPOINT_URL.description: The base URL of the S3-compatible API.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.title: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Your access key (public identifier) for authenticating with the storage service.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.title: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The secret key (private) that pairs with the access key to sign requests.

AWS_REGION.title: AWS_REGION
AWS_REGION.description: The region name used by the client library.
